text: Hit or miss here, sometime great pizza fast. Other times they are understaffed and slow, or quality suffers. There has been times the resturant was completely empty no workers no lights nothing and the doors were open this was during business hours.

text: We ordered from the new store because it's close to our house. Worst pizza I've had in a long time, the dough was undercooked, sauce tasted super sweet, it was not at all appetizing.  The delivery driver was fast and friendly though.

name: Kent Poppe
text: Online order took over an hour and a half to get. Called them once to see when we could expect the order and was told ten minutes. Called twenty minutes later and told it was next in line for delivery. When it got here it was mostly cold so must have sat for a while before delivery

name: M D
text: The whole place was dirty. The staff was friendly, but very understaffed. The bathrooms were out of towels, toilet paper, and soap. When alerted about the state of the bathroom, nothing was done while we were there. The food was good, but I won't be back.

name: Casey Dinham

text: Online ordering was easy, fast, and good value.  However, products have always been disappointing.  Tonight,  2 slices of my pepperoni pizza only had one piece of pepperoni each.
